thread.section_title: Tailor4Less Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Tailor4Less | tailor4less.com
thread.title: Dominic Tate

author: Dominic Tate
title: Dominic Tate
text: As a first time buyer of a suit, I was highly satisfied with the product. It fitted perfectly, got exactly what I ordered and arrived well before it was meant to. The websites layout is easy to use and the guidelines for measuring yourself is brilliant and clearly works as my suit fits like a dream. If you are looking for a suit I highly recommend using this site. Do not worry about measurements as the way they have set up there site makes it work perfectly.
